# Contributing to Tillerstead.com

Thank you for your interest in contributing!

## Guidelines
- Follow Tillerstead quality standards (see README)
- Use Conventional Commits for messages
- Ensure all code passes lint, build, and test
- Check accessibility and SEO compliance
- Document complex logic and changes

## How to Contribute
1. Fork the repo and create your branch
2. Make changes and commit with clear messages
3. Open a pull request using the template
4. Address review feedback promptly

## Code of Conduct
Be respectful and constructive. See [CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) if available.
